indicator_orig: Percentage of days when daily maximum temperature is greater than the 90th percentile

indicator_orig: Number of icing days: annual count of days when TX (daily maximum temperature) <0°C
indicator_harmonized: number of icing days: annual count of days when tx (daily maximum temperature) <0°c

indicator_orig: Number of frost days: annual count of days when TN (daily minimum temperature) <0°C
indicator_harmonized: number of frost days: annual count of days when tn (daily minimum temperature) <0°c

indicator_orig: Warm spell duration index: annual count of days with at least six consecutive days when TX >90th percentile
indicator_harmonized: warm spell duration index (wsdi)

indicator_orig: Cold spell duration index: annual count of days with at least six consecutive days when TN <10th percentile
indicator_harmonized: cold spell duration index: annual count of days with at least six consecutive days when tn <10th percentile

indicator_orig: Number of summer days: annual count of days when TX (daily maximum temperature) >25°C
indicator_harmonized: number of summer days: annual count of days when tx (daily maximum temperature) >25°c

indicator_orig: Number of tropical nights: annual count of days when TN (daily minimum temperature) >20°C
indicator_harmonized: number of tropical nights: annual count of days when tn (daily minimum temperature) >20°c

indicator_orig: Daily temperature range: monthly mean difference between TX and TN
indicator_harmonized: daily temperature range: monthly mean difference between tx and tn

indicator_orig: Growing season length: annual (1 Jan to 31 Dec in Northern Hemisphere (NH), 1 July to 30 June in Southern Hemisphere (SH)) count between first span of at least six days with daily mean temperature TG >5°C and first span after July 1 (Jan 1 in SH) of six days with TG <5°C
indicator_harmonized: growing season length: annual (1 jan to 31 dec in northern hemisphere (nh), 1 july to 30 june in southern hemisphere (sh)) count between first span of at least six days with daily mean temperature tg >5°c and first span after july 1 (jan 1 in sh) of six days with tg <5°c
